Applicant : Horchler, Kendall
School (district) : Madison High School (Madison School District)
Role(s) : Special Education Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I am currently a CNA at a nursing home and have been for the last 6 years. I also have my medication administration assistant which required another certification. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As a special education teacher I need to know a wide range of content to help my students as a lot of my kids are in typical high school classes. I want to better know how to help them be successful. I also want to opportunity to add to my 'toolbox' to help kids throughout my career as I'm starting my Masters to be a School Counselor.
This applicant likes work environments that are:

STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* In-Person
	* Remote
	* Hybrid
